rows.label: tev013801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev013801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Trevor about the purpose of BLADE.

rows.label: tev013801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev013801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Trevor if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev013801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Trevor for his opinion about you.

rows.label: tev013801_SEL0041
rows.name:
Ask Trevor for his thoughts on the
xenoforms you saw in Primordia.

rows.label: tev013801_SEL0051
rows.name:
Ask Trevor for his thoughts on the hostile
xenoforms you saw in Noctilum.

rows.label: tev013801_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Trevor about the operational limits of the Lifehold.

rows.label: tev013801_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Trevor about the Ganglion's movements.

rows.label: tev013801_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Trevor about the damages suffered in the attack.

rows.label: tev013801_SEL0091
rows.name:
Ask Trevor about the possibility
of a Ganglion spy in BLADE.

rows.label: tev013801_SEL0101
rows.name: Ask Trevor for his thoughts on Lao's betrayal.

rows.label: tev013801_SEL0111
rows.name: Ask Trevor about the battle for the Lifehold Core.

rows.label: tev013801_SEL0121
rows.name: Ask Trevor what he intends to do next.

rows.label: tev013801_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Trevor about recent developments.

rows.label: tev013801_SEL3011
rows.name: Ask Trevor about recent developments.

rows.label: tev013801_SEL4011
rows.name: Ask if Trevor has any interesting news.

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0001
rows.name:
The members of each division have their own
responsibilities, but mine is primarily guard duty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0002
rows.name:
Lately there have been reports of dangerous indigens
appearing near the entrances to the city. That's why
we've sealed the gates and taken a defensive posture.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0003
rows.name:
We've tightened our guard to the extent that there's
absolutely no chance of an indigen infiltrating the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0004
rows.name:
But now I hear that Elma and some new [ST:gender p1=guy p2=gal ] already
slaughtered the grex pack that prowled outside the
west gate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0005
rows.name:
So I guess we all ought to thank Team Elma for their
successful counteroffensive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0010
rows.name:
Carl is pathetic. I put him on indigen-control duty,
and he hasn't killed a single one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0011
rows.name:
If I didn't have so many damn duties of my own,
I'd march right up to him and spank him like
the insolent child he is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0012
rows.name:
Hey, if you're headed that way, could you give Carl
a message for me? He'll be the one loitering out in
front of the arms manufacturers' building.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0013
rows.name:
Tell him to pull his head out and get his goddamn
work done before Trevor has to stick a boot so far
up his ass he'll taste shoe polish for a month.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0020
rows.name:
So when Nagi asked if you wanted to be a BLADE,
you signed up on the spot?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0021
rows.name: You got gumption, kid. I'll give you that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0022
rows.name:
You ain't like the new recruits I got under me.
They hemmed and hawed about joining BLADE
until the last possible minute.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0023
rows.name:
You keep that backbone of yours handy as you go
about learning the ropes, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0024
rows.name: Make me proud, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0030
rows.name:
If everything that "Tatsu" Nopon said is true,
then the Prone are bad news indeed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0031
rows.name:
Apparently they're indiscriminately attacking all the
native peoples of Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0032
rows.name:
Considering that, Nelson's may not be the only team
that's been hit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0033
rows.name:
Our first step should be gathering data about their
positions and movements from FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0040
rows.name:
If these so-called Ganglion are part of the group that
destroyed Earth, then we really need to start operating
like it's DEFCON 1 around here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0041
rows.name:
I'm gonna tell the Interceptors to raise their readiness
level, stat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0042
rows.name:
I want you out there in the unexplored areas,
planting data probes like your life depends on it.
We need to get eyes on our enemies ASAP![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0043
rows.name:
Once we have that intel, we can plan our next move.
Godspeed to you, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0050
rows.name:
Elma must really trust you if she shared that piece
of information.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0051
rows.name:
Well, it's true. That number on the top of BLADE Tower
shows how much power the Lifehold has remaining. 
In effect, it shows how much time we all have left.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0052
rows.name: We have to find the Lifehold Core before it hits zero.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0053
rows.name:
Otherwise, you and me and everyone else will just keel
over on the spot, and humanity will be wiped from the
universe forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0054
rows.name:
We don't have much time left, so expand FrontierNav
and give us a shot at a future![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0060
rows.name:
I can't believe the enemy found out about the Lifehold
Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0061
rows.name:
If they beat us to the Core, they'll destroy it like they
did the last piece of the Lifehold they found.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0062
rows.name:
We wouldn't even have a chance to fight for our lives.
All of humanity would be wiped out in an instant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0063
rows.name:
We're almost out of time. We have to install as many
data probes as we possibly can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0064
rows.name:
That's the only chance we have to locate the
Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0070
rows.name:
We managed to repel that giant, mostly thanks to
your impressive efforts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0071
rows.name:
I've never been in a battle with so many casualties
before. I lost multiple members of my team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0072
rows.name:
Damn it all! We have to find the Lifehold Core and
bring back everyone who gave their lives to protect us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0080
rows.name:
I found it highly suspicious that the enemy was aware
of the operational limits of our mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0081
rows.name:
That information was known only to those in
leadership positions within BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0082
rows.name:
So it does seem likely that a BLADE has been leaking
information to the enemy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0083
rows.name:
It's an unpleasant matter to discuss, but we have to find
the traitor before he or she does something irreversible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0090
rows.name:
As the ace of the Pathfinders, Lao installed more
data probes than anyone in BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0091
rows.name:
Doug wasn't the only one he tricked, either.
He was widely trusted, and his work was held in
high esteem by virtually everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0092
rows.name:
Dammit! Was everything he did just a way to sell
information to the Ganglion?! And why?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0093
rows.name:
Until I hear the reason from his own lips,
I'll never be able to accept this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0094
rows.name:
Bring him back to New LA as quickly as you can,
[ST:playername ]. We're all counting on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0100
rows.name: I swear on my pride as an Interceptor...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0101
rows.name: we will escort you safely to the Lifehold Core![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0102
rows.name:
All you need to do is take it back.
The fate of humanity is riding on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0110
rows.name:
We have to use the Lifehold Core to bring our fallen
comrades back to life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0111
rows.name:
And yet, our researchers don't seem to have made any
progress. Not a single man has been revived.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0112
rows.name:
What's the holdup? Do you think something may have
gone wrong inside the Lifehold?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG1059
rows.name:
So miracle of miracles, Carl actually pulled off the
indigen bounty mission I assigned to him.
Even did a decent job of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG1060
rows.name:
If he keeps completing missions like that, he might
actually become a respectable BLADE.
...Best not count that chicken before it's hatched.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG1061
rows.name: I've got sharp eyes. I'll keep looking after the kid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG1062
rows.name:
I'll teach him all the things I couldn't teach to my
own son that I abandoned on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG2063
rows.name: I tasked Carl with an indigen bounty mission...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG2064
rows.name:
But he abandoned the mission. Claimed the targets
were just babies and he didn't have the heart to kill
'em, or some such nonsense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG2065
rows.name:
He's a BLADE, dammit! Not a nursery-school teacher!
If he doesn't toughen up soon, I fear for what will
become of him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG2066
rows.name:
Damn it all... That side of him reminds me so much
of the son I left behind on Earth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG3074
rows.name:
I don't think there's a worse soldier in all of BLADE
than Carl.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG3075
rows.name:
But when I talk to him and see that strange gentleness
and rebellious sense of justice at his core...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG3076
rows.name:
he reminds me so much of the son I left behind
on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG3077
rows.name:
I wasn't a good father to my son. We weren't even on
speaking terms when I left to come here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG3078
rows.name:
So at the very least, I'd like to teach Carl everything
I'd have wanted to teach my son.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG3079
rows.name:
But before I can talk to that idiot about protecting NLA,
I have to figure out how to keep him from getting
himself killed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG0087
rows.name:
I have a buddy here named Nathan that I've known
since my army days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG5088
rows.name:
He got ambushed by a super-strong indigen when he
was out on one of his Curator scavenging missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG5089
rows.name:
And one of the younger members of the team went 
missing after that. Nathan was searching everywhere
for the guy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG5090
rows.name:
When Nathan finally made it back, he and I went out
drinking for the first time in a long while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG5091
rows.name:
It made for a night of lively conversation, now that
we both got younger subordinates making our lives
miserable![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG5092
rows.name:
When Nathan finally made it back, he and I went out
drinking for the first time in a long while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev013801_MSG5093
rows.name:
We ended up deep in conversation about the young
people in our lives that are driving us crazy.[ST:wait ]
